Group Members:Pranav Achanta 		UFID Ð 15512289Chandana Shilpa		UFID - 88938144Size of the Work Unit:For a given input of n zeroes to be found, we have used a payload ~ 16^(n+1). As per our experiments, best performance was obtained when each core (including remote ones) participating in the process received on average two Work Units.Result of Program for 4 ZeroesInput :
